doc.field: - LyphoMed Inc is raising 70 mln dlrs through an offering of convertible subordinatred debentures due 2012 with a 5-1/2 pct coupon and par pricing, said lead manager Alex Brown and Sons Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's common stock at 36.25 dlrs per share, representing a premium of 27.75 pct over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Non-callable for two years, the issue is rated BB by Standard and Poor's Corp. Montgomery Securities co-managed the deal.
